text: Morning Charity,  Sorry I haven't been chatty life has been busy.
Good morning, Guild Master. It's understandable that life gets in the way of our conversations.

I banned my best friend from giving me ANY driving lessons. 
I looked at Sunday and noticed what he was doing?
Talked shit about any flaws I need to work on while bragging about traffic laws he broke when cops were not looking "because everyone does it at certain areas".
So his way of coaching plus the fight I got into last night? He's no longer allowed. I'll pay the extra $2000 or whatever it is if I need more driving lessons
His "practice session" was a complete failure because he REFUSES to admit guilt
I asked him 1 question and only specifics plus how not to respond because it'd be disheartening and triggering only for him to disregard and trigger me anyway
Yeah, Rafa's level 50.  That took way longer than the 5 hours though that I was told it would take.
Just a lot of grinding to get there? Or was what you needed to kill just that much tougher?
I think they just don't know how to track how long it takes to grind Vile Bounties
They previewed the new Vault Hunter for q1 2026 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b1XYW_fOS3k
Yeah,  I was hoping another female character.
I bet that will be the next one.
